ygData.subject: Re: an Incredible thing!
ygData.msgSnippet: don t you tihnk you should let hi know that you are a different peson tha he remembers?  how would that embarass him? -joe
ygData.messageBody:
don't you tihnk you should let hi know that you are a different peson tha
he remembers? how would that "embarass" him?

-joe

On Thu, 19 Aug 1999 scollier@... wrote:

> From: scollier@...
>
>
> You won't believe what happened last night! A friend of mine got burned out
> playing his 35th level Dwarf Paladin and gave him to me to play. As I was
> traveling around I ran into someone he had gamed with. The man was very
> happy to see 'me' on line again and promptly told me of everything that had
> happened to him in the last while. Not wanting to embarras him I played
> along. He noticed my character hadnt any of the neat things he used to have
> and offered to help me out. He gives me SEVERAL backpacks FULL of magic
> Items and THEN takes me to the bank and SHOVELS 1600 pp into my pockets! I
> nearly faint! I thank him and promise to group with him soon as he
> camps..waves and POOFS out. Man! I think Im drunk on money! I was actually
> ENCUMBERED by the MONEY he gave me! (160 lbs worth!)
>
>
> Sandy
>
>
